title: 85. Cold Little Heart (Radio Edit) - Michael Kiwanuka
text: I love this song it's fire af ty üôèüèº Biography Born: 1987 in London, England Genre: R&B/Soul Years Active: '00s, '10s With his acoustic blues-folk sound and timeless soulful voice, singer/songwriter Michael Kiwanuka has been favorably compared to Curtis Mayfield, Terry Callier, and Van Morrison. He was born in Muswell Hill, London in 1987, to Ugandan parents who had fled Idi Amin's regime in the '70s. He initially developed a love of rock music -- in particular, Radiohead and Nirvana -- and he performed in various cover bands while briefly studying jazz at the Royal Academy of Music and pop music at Westminster...   Michael Kiwanuka 1.
